item.title: Andrew will not face police action over bodyguard claim
item.description: The allegations, first reported in October, said he tried to obtain personal information about his accuser Virginia Giuffre through his police protect...

item.title: Men arrested after village Christmas tree cut down
item.description: Police say they are in the process of charging a man with criminal damage after the tree was felled.

item.title: Salah makes Liverpool return against Brighton
item.description: Mohamed Salah makes his return for Liverpool in Saturday's Premier League game against Brighton.

item.title: Belarus frees 123 prisoners as US lifts sanctions
item.description: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova is among those released in exchange for a deal with the US.

item.title: BMA warns of flu 'scaremongering' ahead of doctor strikes
item.description: The health secretary should focus on offering a deal instead of "scaremongering the public", the BMA says.
